plot: Go deep undercover as narc officers Sonny Crockett and Ricardo Tubbs to bring down a South American drug lord.
title: Miami Vice: The Game
plot_es: Go deep undercover as narc officers Sonny Crockett and Ricardo Tubbs to bring down a South American drug lord.
